# VEHICLE::SET_TURRET_HIDDEN

## Summary
Sets the hidden status of a turret

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **INT** turret
* **BOOL** hideTurret

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles specific flag on turret
